definitions.definition: A cocktail made by muddling sugar with bitters and adding whiskey or, less commonly, brandy, served with a twist of citrus rind.
Of a thing, outdated or no longer in vogue.
definitions.example: My bike is old-fashioned but it gets me around.

definitions.definition: Of a person, preferring the customs of earlier times.
definitions.example: You can’t stay the night, because my parents are a bit old-fashioned.
